'''Halloween Costumes Skin Pack'''<ref>[https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=1d801b54-38aa-4ec0-bbf4-311a40d30268 Halloween Costumes Skin Pack in Minecraft Marketplace]</ref> is a skin pack that includes 15 skins themed by being dressed up for Halloween.
